content: co a number divisible by 2 plus 3 additional sts adjusting co will affect total yardage needed row 1 ws sl1 wyif k to end row 2 rs sl1 wyif k2 kfb k to last 5 sts k2tog k3 repeat row 1 two more times ro w 3 ws sl1 wyif k3 p to last 4 sts k4 slanted lace row 1 rs sl1 wyif k3 yo k2tog to last 3 sts k3 row 2 ws sl1 wyif k3 p to last 4 sts k4 repeat row 1 and 2 fifteen more times note to make the stripe section taller repeat row 1 and 2 of the slanted lace section additional times keep in mind 4 more row of this color will be worked in the garter transition section adjusting row counts will affect total yardage needed garter transition row 1 rs sl1 wyif k to end repeat row 1 once row 2 rs sl1 wyif k2 kfb k to last 5 sts k2tog k3 repeat row 1 once cut yarn and switch to color b repeat row 1 twice repeat row 2 once repeat row 1 twice row 3 ws sl1 wyif k3 p to last 4 sts k4 3 continuing with color b work slanted lace section and garter transition instructions once more switching to color c during transition work slanted lace section once more with color c garter edge row 1 rs sl1 wyif k to end repeat row 1 once more row 2 rs sl1 wyif k2 kfb k to last 5 sts k2tog k3 row 3 ws sl1 wyif k to end bobble all sts loosely finishing block to finished measurements wear and enjoy pattern key bobble - bind off co - cast on k - knit kfb knit into the front and back of the next st +1 st k2tog - knit next 2 stitches together p purl repeat repeat sl - slip_stitch purl-wise unless stated otherwise wyib - with yarn in back wyif - with yarn in front yo - yarnover bring yarn under needle in front and over needle to back thank you for supporting juliana lustenader designs follow on instagram @knitbyjules watch youtube tutorials @knitbyjules download free and for-sale pdf patterns on ravelry lovecrafts & payhip 4
